Article.ArticleTitle: MIP-C: A new autoimmune rheumatic disease concomitant with the COVID-19 pandemic.

MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: Conflict of interest Antonio La Cava is a Co-Editor-in-Chief of the journal. The article was subjected to the standard procedures of the journal, with a review process independent of the editor and his research group.
